mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.name, t.create_time, COUNT(bt.blog_id) AS blog_count, COUNT(bt.blog_id) AS article_count FROM tag t LEFT JOIN blog_tag bt ON t.id = bt.tag_id LEFT JOIN blog b ON bt.blog_id = b.id AND b.publish_status = 1 AND b.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY t.id, t.name, t.create_time ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
